      • getServiceResponse

        public static org.json.JSONObject getServiceResponse(String reponse)
                                              throws org.json.JSONException,
                                                     OneBusAwayException
        Checks the response code of the OneBusAway API and return the JSON Object named "data".
        Parameters:
        reponse - the reponse of the OneBusAway API
        Returns:
        the JSON Object named "data"
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - the response does not contains valid data
        OneBusAwayException - the API returned an error code
